mapper.insert: insert into menu_translate values(menu_translate_seq.nextval, #{menu_kor}, #{menu_eng}, #{price}, #{business_id}, #{business_name}, sysdate, null, 'N')
mapper.update: update menu_translate set confirm_YN='Y' where seq=${value}
mapper.select: select seq, menu_kor, menu_eng, price from menu_translate where business_id=#{value}
select count(*) from ( select business_id, count(business_id) from menu_translate group by business_id)

select business_id, business_name, reg_date, confirm_yn from (select * from (select row_number() over(order by seq desc) rnum, seq, business_id, business_name, reg_date, confirm_YN from menu_translate where seq in(select max(seq) from menu_translate group by business_id)) where rnum between #{startNum} and #{endNum}) order by confirm_yn
